title: My Lovely Bodyguard
overview: Teywan is the CEO of Siam Palace whose life was flat since he only put his efforts into uncovering the murder case of his sister and brother-in-law. Teywan met Sarapee accidentally while he was being hunted by someone. She risked her life to save him. This led Teywan to be impressed in her fighting skills, so he asked her to work as his bodyguard.
